item.title: Lol
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Sure lemme just check my client.java…

Here::

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Add the if (playerRights >= 2) in urself lol

This code makes it so you have to type ::update (time)
Eg: ::update 120
^^ this would make it update in 2 mins (doing countdown “like rs”)

Good Luck
